snippet.title: Islets Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Take to the sky and reunite a fragmented world in this surprisingly wholesome metroidvania! Help Iko adventure across lush and painterly islands, receive letters from a quirky cast of characters, and face powerful monster adversaries.

Stay in touch by wishlisting now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1669420/Islets/
